articles.description: Virat Kohli Kohli played a loose shot off Ashton Agar's delivery and perished on 54
articles.content: India conceded a rare series defeat at home as Australia turned the tide on the hosts to win the series-deciding third and final ODI in Chennai on Wednesday. Chasing a target of 270, India seemed to … [+1330 chars]
